author: Special Correspondent
text:
Unidentified persons robbed a youth of a mobile phone and cash at Narimedu in the small hours of Wednesday.

Police said that M. Rajesh, who was studying third year engineering in a college in Salem, had come home for Pongal holidays. When he was walking his way to his home in Narimedu around 3.30 a.m., he was waylaid by two bike-borne men.

After assaulting him, the two snatched his mobile phone and Rs. 300 at knifepoint. Then, they fled the scene.
title: Youth robbed
